entries.meaning: A member of the alt.suicide.holiday newsgroup, which deals with the topics of suicide and depression.
examples: ANYONE who first stumbles upon ash is bound to want to SAVE these desperately unhappy people. If you think Daisy was the first or last person trying to knock sense into the ashers, you are wrong. And from my observations, Anyone with only good intentions, (say trying to give ashers a spiritual outlook) is visciously [sic] attacked by ash.
